languages.text: {n}Юноша широко и искренне улыбается вам.{/n} "На Тассере принято верить в священное перерождение. Чтобы достойные могли служить Императору вечно!"
{n}The young priest gives you a broad and sincere smile.{/n} "It is customary on Thassera to believe in sacred reincarnation. Thus, the worthy may serve the Emperor for all eternity!"
languages.original_text: {n}Юноша широко и искренне улыбается вам.{/n} "На Тассере принято верить в священное перерождение. Чтобы достойные могли служить Императору вечно!"

{n}The young priest gives you a broad and sincere smile.{/n} "It is customary on Thassera to believe in sacred reincarnation. Thus, the worthy may serve the Emperor for all eternity!"

languages.text: {n}年轻的牧师则对你露出了灿烂、真诚的笑容。{/n}“在塔瑟拉，人们相信神圣的轮回生生不息。这样一来，帝皇真正的忠仆就可以生生世世侍奉祂了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The young priest gives you a broad and sincere smile.{/n} "It is customary on Thassera to believe in sacred reincarnation. Thus, the worthy may serve the Emperor for all eternity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻的牧师则对你露出了灿烂、真诚的笑容。{/n}“在塔瑟拉，人们相信神圣的轮回生生不息。这样一来，帝皇真正的忠仆就可以生生世世侍奉祂了！”

languages.text: {n}若い司祭はあなたに、誠実で晴れやかな笑みを向けた。{/n}「タッセーラでは、聖なる転生を信じるのが慣わしです。ゆえに、価値ある者は永遠に皇帝陛下に仕えることができるのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The young priest gives you a broad and sincere smile.{/n} "It is customary on Thassera to believe in sacred reincarnation. Thus, the worthy may serve the Emperor for all eternity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}若い司祭はあなたに、誠実で晴れやかな笑みを向けた。{/n}「タッセーラでは、聖なる転生を信じるのが慣わしです。ゆえに、価値ある者は永遠に皇帝陛下に仕えることができるのです！」

languages.text: {n}El sacerdote joven te dedica una amplia y sincera sonrisa.{/n} «Aquí en Thassera es costumbre creer en la sagrada reencarnación. ¡Así los dignos de tal honor pueden servir al Emperador por toda la eternidad!».
languages.original_text: {n}The young priest gives you a broad and sincere smile.{/n} "It is customary on Thassera to believe in sacred reincarnation. Thus, the worthy may serve the Emperor for all eternity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacerdote joven te dedica una amplia y sincera sonrisa.{/n} «Aquí en Thassera es costumbre creer en la sagrada reencarnación. ¡Así los dignos de tal honor pueden servir al Emperador por toda la eternidad!».

languages.text: {n}Genç sana geniş ve samimi bir gülümsemeyle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Thassera'da kutsal yeniden doğuşa inanmak âdettendir. Layık olanlar, İmparator'a sonsuza dek kulluk eder!"
languages.original_text: {n}The young priest gives you a broad and sincere smile.{/n} "It is customary on Thassera to believe in sacred reincarnation. Thus, the worthy may serve the Emperor for all eternity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Küçük olan rahip sana geniş ve samimi bir gülümsemeyle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Thassera'da kutsal yeniden doğuşa inanmak âdettendir. Layık olanlar, İmparator'a sonsuza dek kulluk eder!"

languages.text: {n}Le jeune prêtre vous adresse un large sourire sincère.{/n} « Il est de coutume sur Thassera de croire à la réincarnation sacrée. Ainsi, les justes peuvent servir l'Empereur pour l'éternité ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The young priest gives you a broad and sincere smile.{/n} "It is customary on Thassera to believe in sacred reincarnation. Thus, the worthy may serve the Emperor for all eternity!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune prêtre vous adresse un large sourire sincère.{/n} « Il est de coutume sur Thassera de croire à la réincarnation sacrée. Ainsi, les justes peuvent servir l'Empereur pour l'éternité ! »

languages.text: {n}Der junge Priester lächelt breit und aufrichtig.{/n} "Auf Thassera glaubt man an die heilige Reinkarnation. Daher können die Würdigen dem Imperator bis in alle Ewigkeit dienen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The young priest gives you a broad and sincere smile.{/n} "It is customary on Thassera to believe in sacred reincarnation. Thus, the worthy may serve the Emperor for all eternity!"
